name: quobyte
description: Quobyte is a software defined distributed file system, running on commodity hardware.
preInstallNotes:
Installing Quobyte.
Recommended Mesos version for this package is 0.24.
In order to start the Quobyte framework a minimum of 1 cpu share and 128MB RAM need to be available.
Please ensure your devices have been set up (see https://github.com/quobyte/mesos-framework#setup-devices)
postInstallNotes:
Quobyte has been successfully installed!

	Documentation: https://support.quobyte.com/
postUninstallNotes:
Quobyte has been uninstalled.
 Please note that device tags do persist (see https://github.com/quobyte/mesos-framework#setup-devices)
